author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Arcimoto Q1 Loss Per Share $0.13
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Arcimoto Inc:
* ARCIMOTO REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 * ARCIMOTO - HAD $11.2 MILLION IN CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, COMPARED TO $14.1 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
